name: v1.12.0
body:

* Require RuboCop Minitest 0.22 or higher by @koic in https://github.com/toshimaru/rubocop-rails_config/pull/153
* Enable `Lint/DuplicateMagicComment` cop by @koic in https://github.com/toshimaru/rubocop-rails_config/pull/154

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/toshimaru/rubocop-rails_config/compare/v1.11.3...v1.12.0

name: v1.7.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Enable `Lint/DuplicateMethods` cop by @koic in https://github.com/toshimaru/rubocop-rails_config/pull/129
* Add rubocop v1.23 by @toshimaru in https://github.com/toshimaru/rubocop-rails_config/pull/130

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/toshimaru/rubocop-rails_config/compare/v1.7.4...v1.7.5

- Require Rails v5.2+ for testing (#125) 
- Add rubocop v1.20 #124

- Enable Minitest/UnreachableAssertion cop #122 @koic 
- Require RuboCop 1.9 or higher #121 @koic
- Enable Layout/ClosingParenthesisIndentation cop and require RuboCop 1.8 or higher #120 (@koic )
- Add rubocop support: v1.15, v1.16, v1.17
- Drop Ruby 2.4 support and require RuboCop 1.13 or higher #112 ( @koic )

- Relax TargetRubyVersion #107 @koic 

If you'd like to specify `TargetRubyVersion`, see [Customization](https://github.com/toshimaru/rubocop-rails_config#customization).

## ⚠️ Exclude directories by `rubocop-rails_config` gem has been changed

`db` and `config` directories are NOT excluded by default. (see also. #104 #105)

If you'd like to ignore these directories, please set your own `Exclude` setting in your project.

```yml
inherit_mode:
  merge:
    - Exclude

AllCops:
  Exclude:
    - 'config/**/*'
    - 'db/**/*'
```

## Changes

- Exclude only schema.rb in db directory #104
- Include config directory by default #105

- Default branch for Rails is now main instead of master #99 ( @willnet )
- Add rubocop v1.10 #100 ( @toshimaru )

- Update README #98 (@koic)
- Require RuboCop 1.8 or higher #97 (@koic)
- Disable `Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVariable` cop #95 (@koic)
- Enable `Performance/BindCall` cop #96 (@koic)
- Opt out of `SuggestExtensions` message #94 (@koic)
- Add Ruby v3.0 and rubocop v1.8 support #91

name: v1.0.0: rubocop-rails_config now requires rubocop v1.0
body:
This is the first rubocop-rails_config v1.0.0 release, which requires rubucop v1.0+. 

- Enable `Layout/SpaceAroundOperators` cop #83 (@koic )

We still supports Ruby 2.4. ;)

- Add rubocop 1.0 support 🎉 
- Enable rubocop-packing 📦 
- Drop rubocop 0.85-0.88  💧 

PR. #82

- Support rubocop v0.93 (#80)
- Sync rubocop setting with the upstream #79

- Branch rename: `master` to `main`
- Support rubocop 0.90, 0.91, 0.92 #78
- Drop rubocop 0.82, 0.83, 0.84 #78

- Enable `Performance/DeletePrefix` and `Performance/DeleteSuffix` cops #73 ( @koic )
- Add rubocop v0.83 and rubocop v0.84 support #72 ( @toshimaru )

- Exclude bin/ db/ and config/ from Lint #48 ( @gnomus )
- Update README #46 ( @toshimaru )

Update for `Layout/FirstParameterIndentation` name change #43 (by @Floppy )

## Changes

- rubocop requires **v0.70+**
- `TargetRubyVersion` is now **2.3**
- [rubocop-performance](https://github.com/rubocop-hq/rubocop-performance) and [rubocop-rails](https://github.com/rubocop-hq/rubocop-rails) are added as the dependency

- CI against RuboCop 0.64, 0.65, and 0.66 #36 @koic 
- Drop Ruby 2.2 Support / Drop rubocop  v0.58 & v0.59 Support  #37

- Drop rubocop v0.56/v0.57 Support #26
- Fix CI #25

- Enable `Style/RedundantBegin` cop #22 by @koic 
- Add Ruby 2.6 Support #23

- Add RuboCop v0.59 and v0.60 on CI #17 by @toshimaru
- RuboCop Rails Config Update #16 by @toshimaru
- Turn on performance based cops #9 by @koic

- Stop using CustomCops 
- Change rubocop dependency (requires 0.56+) 

PullRequest: #10 

(Thanks for reporting issue, @5290charlie)
Exclude Ruby files in db directory #5
- Add `CustomCops/AssertNot` rule #2 (This gives warning message if you use RuboCop v0.56 or more)

- Add update generator. Update your RuboCop yaml with the following command.

```
bundle exec rails generate  rubocop_rails_config:update
```
